subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s national soccer team is trying to rebuild after the World Cup, but the rehiring of Dunga for his second stint as coach has raised questions about the direction the team is taking.
snippet: Brazil’s national soccer team is trying to rebuild after the World Cup, but the rehiring of Dunga for his second stint as coach has raised questions about the direction the team is taking.
